title: G2 Protectors Addon
briefDescription: Welcome! This addon provides you with a mob that spawns so you will be protected when they exit their Minecraft house. This mob is called ?...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome! This addon provides you with a mob that spawns so you will be protected when they exit their Minecraft house. This mob is called ?G2? and it does not replace any mob so it requires you to turn on Experimental Gameplay.
Turn on Experimental Gameplay!
This addon provides a spawn egg which spawns a mob that will protect you. This mob spawns naturally but you could go in creative to spawn it. This mob afflicts the withering potion effect upon getting hit. This mob can defeat any mob if put in the right environment. The mob has 40 hearts so it will probably not die from most mobs in a natural environment.

title: Black Hole Addon (1.16+)
briefDescription: Black holes that were only in the unknown, now summon them from Minecraft and attract all living things! The powerful gravity of a black hole ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Black holes that were only in the unknown, now summon them from Minecraft and attract all living things! The powerful gravity of a black hole beyond your imagination may swallow your thoughts!
Hello. Long time no see.
This time, I made a black hole addon.
This black hole add-on will play a key role in making you powerful.
The add-on is simply composed of one item, which can be obtained through ?/function item? or ?/give @s kr:blackhole.?

If you get this item and click on the air, you will have a powerful black hole.
This black hole attracts all living things except you.
(even items)

title: Halloween 2020 Addon ? Happy Halloween!
briefDescription: Happy Halloween everyone! I hope you have a spooky time today and enjoy this new update!We?ve reached the spookiest month of the year ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Happy Halloween everyone! I hope you have a spooky time today and enjoy this new update!
We?ve reached the spookiest month of the year now! But do you think Minecraft could also be spookier? Well you came to the right place. This is an addon that will add new Halloween content into your game! There will be updates with new features every week for this October! Hope you enjoy this!
The first new feature is a new mob, it?s the Pumpkin Knight! This skeleton wields a sword and will charge at you with it, the knight also won?t burn in the sun because of the pumpkin it is wearing! It?s attacks will inflict weakness onto you! They will drop their pumpkin and sometimes their sword if killed and you can find them spawning in flower and birch forest biomes.

The next new mob is the Pumpkin Ghast! It can also be found in flower and birch forests. If you get too close it starts spitting projectiles at you. It?s less damaging but has more health then a ghast due to its tough pumpkin! And that pumpkin will drop if you kill it!

This new mob is the Creepy Crawly! A terrifying giant spider that resides in the extreme hills biomes. Has lots of health and high attack damage! It also sometimes inflicts blindness on you! Drops a spider eye, some string or rarely a Spider Heart if killed. You can either eat this heart to get strength, resistance and nausea for 30 seconds or you can make a Cobweb Staff! The Cobweb Staff shoots slowing cobwebs!

Up next is the Candy Parrot! Right now the Candy Parrot doesn?t spawn anywhere but I will change that. It?s immune to fire but hurt by water, this parrot also has a lot of health but never moves. If you kill it you?ll get candy! Candy is not a very good food source but can be eaten fast. If you make a bag out of leather and string then merge the bag with 5 Candy, you?ll get a Bag of Candy. The Bag of Candy is much better then the normal Candy is.

The fifth new mob to look at is the Zombie Chicken! As you guessed, it?s a zombie chicken. This chicken is also out for brains and as such it will attack all other animals as well as YOU! It?s attacks inflict fatal poison (poison that is able to kill you) so watch out! However, they will burn in sunlight. Zombie Chickens will spawn in Mesa and desert biomes and drop rotten flesh if killed.

Our final new mob is simply referred to as the Headless. This terrifying mob is a villager without a head. How scary is that? This poor being cannot move, does not make sounds and is pretty much defenceless! They spawn in the Nether, to make your time in their even more hellish? also they drop nothing if killed, but why would you waste your time killing these poor souls?

Mobs aren?t it all though, there is some other features in this addon you can find!
You can now make a Pumpkin Sword with a stick and two pumpkins. It?s not that powerful or durable, but increases your maximum health from 20 to 30 while held!

The Jack?O Crossbow is a new ranged weapon that can be crafted like you see below! It shoots projectiles that can explode and light their target on fire! I might consider changing the recipe if you think it?s too strong, leave your thoughts below!
There?s a new spooky item in the game called a Bottle of Blood! As of current, this blood is not obtainable without commands and does not do anything. But again, this will change!
The Shield texture has been changed to look very pumpkin-like! However, the shield isn?t supposed to be upside down, I?ll fix that in the first update.

Spooky Trees are a new tree type located in taiga biomes. They consist of two new blocks, Spooky Leaves and Spooky Logs. Spooky Leaves don?t do anything, but Spooky Logs can be crafted into Spooky Planks! These planks can then be crafted into either a crafting table or sticks, in the same way as any other wood, or a new Spooky Wood Sword! This sword has about the same stats as the normal wooden sword.

title: Minecraft Bedrock?A Drow?s Life
briefDescription: "The Drow"... a mysterious dark elf that lives underground (like Dwarves). They are very magical creatures (usually Evil). Often there are wars underground between the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
?The Drow?? a mysterious dark elf that lives underground (like Dwarves). They are very magical creatures (usually Evil). Often there are wars underground between the Drow and the Dwarves. Occasionally, a Drow Raiding Party will go to the surface at night and raid a village for different and unusual (for the Drow anyways) items to take back underground to their home, like wood, for example.. Sometimes the Villagers don?t survive the raid?
Minecraft Bedrock?A Drow?s Life
If you know my map ?The Drow?, you will understand this add-on. In the original ?The Drow?, you start in a village, find a cave full of Drow, and suffer to rid yourself of them.

In this add-on, You are the Drow! Light is very painful to you (this is not like a zombie burning in the sun, i.e. a helmet does not help). But on a good side, I have permanent Night Vision to see well underground without using any light sources! (If you loose Night Vision for any reason ie. milk, going thru End Portal etc., just log off and back in again) you also have an affinity with spiders! (Upgraded Pet Spider Pack)
You can play a Drow on any seed. Just create a new world, include the pack, and start!
Warning?the beginning can be very dangerous, as you will probably spawn in the bright early morning sun?you better find shelter quickly?or it will be a short game ?

This is going to be very dangerous!
How long can you last?

Drow:
Spider:

For more information on the original ?The Drow? Map: The Drow
Twitch Channel: Twitch
I made a short series on YouTube using this pack called ?A Drow?s Life?. Check it out here?YouTube

title: Conflictic Honor
briefDescription: This addon is about powerful Orcs and knights, but for now, its about four orcs cause its the first version of this addonAs it progresses ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This addon is about powerful Orcs and knights, but for now, its about four orcs cause its the first version of this addonAs it progresses it will be completed, it will have structures, bosses, new items, armor and others, I hope you enjoy it, and have good fights ?
PS: they are not generated naturally yet, this version is simply to report bugs and tests
Reinforced Ogre, the most powerful Monster from this version he have more than four attacks with epic animations and combos and sprint
This is the Normal Ogre, this Ogre have 5 attacks and have good animations too, this is not powerful like reinforced Ogre but is not weak, can beat an iron golem and can throw little Ogres

This is the little Ogre, he is the weakest of the ogres, but that does not mean that he is weak, remember that ogres have superhuman strength, this ogre I did it in a funny way, he throws gases and has some funny animations, escape from the monsters but not from the player, this Ogre is in a group and its attack system is to surround you and attack you making it unpredictable

This is the reinforced Little Ogre It is a little stronger and more resistant than the Little Ogre and it is somewhat problematic since it does not surround you to attack, it directly attacks you and is not as weak as it seems, your bucket on the head makes it a little slower than the little normal ogre and his stick makes him do a little more damage, he is not afraid of monsters and dares to face them

Big ogres have a small chance of dropping their heads, these are physical, they can be climbed on top of them. Its functionality is to scare the ogres, the head of the normal ogre scares the small ogres and the normal large ogre, but not the reinforced ogre. The head of the reinforced ogre scares away all the ogres including the reinforced ogre, this allows the reinforced ogre to approach your home and destroy everything, it literally destroys construction materials in its path, careful

title: Dynamite Projectile Addon
briefDescription: Have you ever wish to be able to throw tnt in minecraft? well, this is your opportunity to do it! with "Dynamite Addon" you will. ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Have you ever wish to be able to throw tnt in minecraft? well, this is your opportunity to do it! with ?Dynamite Addon? you will. Throw this projectile to anything; and instantly it will explode. (works with troll players by the way).
This new item (projectile) once its launched it will delay 2-3 seconds to explode. depending on the random algorithm i created. and once it explode it will create a semi big explosion particle which can hurt any entity near:
Enjoy mining with this, enjoy trolling friends with it. because we have always wished to have dynamite!
-HOW TO PLAY WITH IT-
This new item (projectile) once its launched it will delay 2-3 seconds to explode. depending on the random algorithm i created. and once it explode it will create a semi big explosion particle which can hurt any entity near:
5 blocks away: 2 hearts
3 blocks away: 5 hearts
1 block away: 6 hearts
next to it: entire health bar (on a player)
and talking about the terrain damage? the explosion will create a 5?5 crater, with 2 blocks of depht (can variate).

-INSTALLATION-
in order to install it.. just click the link (mcpack) Behaviour and Resource, and it will open mediafire; where you need to click ?download?, then click on both files and DONE: it will open your minecraft (bedrock) and automatically it will install. and by the way? probably it will send you a tiny error: a walk animation error. its something i couldnt fix, but nothing its affected during gameplay nor the game in general..
-USES-
To obtain the dynamite you can do 2 things?
1. write in the gameplay minecraft chat: /give @s pa:dynamite
2. craft it with the following recipe?

title: Obscure Prehistory: Beta 2
briefDescription: Obscure Prehistory is a new addon in development that focuses on the obscure and unknown creatures of Earths Past. Currently the Second beta contains the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Obscure Prehistory is a new addon in development that focuses on the obscure and unknown creatures of Earths Past. Currently the Second beta contains the basal ankylosaurian known as Minmi, a large ancient Armadillo relative known as the Glyptodon, a large tyrannosaurid known as Zhuchengtyrannus, and the small northern tyrannosaurid called Nanuqsaurus.
*Please notice that this beta has some minor bugs that are being patched*
NOTICE: you are not allowed to make you own download of this addon. If you decide to cover this addon on Youtube, link this MCPEDL page for the Download. This addon will only be posted on MCPEDL and MCPEDL only, if there are downloads on any other website please ignore it or report it.
Ok, now lets start with the mobs
Minmi?s are easy to tame, with the hardest thing about the taming is acquiring a saddle.
In the future, more features to the Glyptodon such as more health, taming, and ability to ward off hostile mobs.

title: Mechs and Jetpacks ? Addon
briefDescription: What do Mechs and Jetpacks have in common? They're both in this pack! Other than that, hmmmmm.... They're both lots of fun..? Yes they are! ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
What do Mechs and Jetpacks have in common? They?re both in this pack! Other than that, hmmmmm?. They?re both lots of fun..? Yes they are! They both can be driven around? Yep. Flown/driven, sure. They both have pixels. YES they do! Wow, these things are more similar than I thought.
Get all of these particular items from your local armorer. Yes. they?ve been going to Advanced Armorer School, obtained their Diploma Of Advanced Armorer-Type Things IV. Well, some of them have, good luck with yours!
